question: Match the following gold mines with their place of existence. 1.Kolar a) Jharkhand 2.Ramgiri b) Karnataka 3.Hirabuddini c) Andhra pardesh
explanation: India has only 3 working gold mines .Kolar, Hutti and Uti are in Karnataka. The Hirabuddini mines is in Jharkhand and Ramgiri Gold Field in Anantpur district, Andhra Pradesh.
